00013 double ConnectionManager::calcInterfDist()
00014 {
00015   double interfDistance;
00016 
00017   //the minimum carrier frequency for this cell
00018   double carrierFrequency = par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue();
00019   //maximum transmission power possible
00020   double pMax             = par("pMax").doubleValue();
00021   if (pMax <=0)
00022     error("Max transmission power is <=0!");
00023   //minimum signal attenuation threshold
00024   double sat              = par("sat").doubleValue();
00025   //minimum path loss coefficient
00026   double alpha            = par("alpha").doubleValue();
00027 
00028   double waveLength     = (BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight/carrierFrequency);
00029   //minimum power level to be able to physically receive a signal
00030   double minReceivePower = pow(10.0, sat/10.0);
00031 
00032   interfDistance = pow(waveLength * waveLength * pMax /
00033            (16.0*M_PI*M_PI*minReceivePower), 1.0/alpha);
00034 
00035   ccEV <<"max interference distance:"<<interfDistance<<endl;
00036 
00037   return interfDistance;
00038 }
